name: God help us all
description:
LimeStar is in trouble It's up to his friends to bail him out as always
Can they really save his skin? or is he doomed to die at the hands of someone who wants to become human?
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Please Visit Patreon and our Shop to keep this project going!

Meet the characters

Limestar- The guy in trouble and only has a butter knife can we defend him?

Roxy- The wolf warrior ready for a beer and a fight 

Jeff- We thought he fixes everything well in this world he destroys it all with grenades

Alexcia-  Our mage that's it what did you think there was more?

This will be updated once every couple of weeks depending on what we get done at the time we will be as fast as we can with this free to play game
